description:
The Human NIBP Device Enabler allows the Human NIBP Controller and Nano Core Systems to stream non-invasive blood pressure data directly into LabChart.

The Human NIBP Device Enabler allows the Human NIBP Controller and Nano Core Systems to stream non-invasive blood pressure data directly into LabChart. The Human NIBP Systems are based on Finapres modules and allow switching between two fingers, permitting prolonged blood pressure measurements with minimal discomfort.
- Fixed an issue where the Human NIBP enabler device scan could put certain other LCC Devices in an unrecoverable state.
- Fixed a minor issue where the Human NIBP Nano would sometimes not be detected when launching LabChart, if there had been a serious device error prior.
Known Issues
There are no new known issues in this release.
